Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-1013 affecting package unixODBC for versions less than 2.3.9-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-1013 affecting package unixODBC for versions less than 2.3.9-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package unixODBC is earlier than 2.3.9-3, affected by CVE-2024-1013
